title: VMware security advisory (AV26-075)
description: Between January 26 and February 1, 2026, VMware published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in multiple Tanzu products.
products: Platform Services for VMware Tanzu Platform   versions prior to 10.3.4
Python Buildpack  versions prior to 1.8.71 and 1.8.75
Service Publisher for VMware Tanzu Platform  versions prior to 10.3.4
Stemcells (Ubuntu Jammy FIPS)  versions prior to 1.1016.x
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
